name: Super Baseball League
description:
# MULTIPLE GAME MODES
- SUPER LEAGUE: Duel mode. A 1vs1 PVP against players from all over the world!
- WORLD LEAGUE: Simulation mode. Dispatch players and reap the rewards!
- SITUATIONAL DRILLS: Mission mode. Overcome challenges that switch every day!
- MEMORY FRAGMENTS: Stage mode. Write your team’s legacy!

# Real-time, fast-paced, thrilling PVP
- Duke it out 1vs1 against real players worldwide
- One shot to defend, and one shot to attack!

# Easy, but hard to master
- Easy controls with real baseball physics!
- A new mobile baseball game with fun at its core!

# Full of colorful playable characters
- Need a fast runner? A righty slugger? Or maybe a leftie fireballer?
Roster your team with only the best players!
- Create the perfect team of players with their own unique skills
